item.title: Royal Caribbean CEO Discusses Q2 Earnings and Outlook
item.description: Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd. shares fell after the cruise operator’s quarterly profit outlook trailed expectations because of costs related to its newest ship. Royal Caribbean CEO and President Jason
